# Constant

## Usage
`@constant [<type>] [<name>]`
or
`@const [<type>] [<name>]`
 
## Overview
Used to register a variable as a constant. 
Usually the `constant` tag is applied to constants with higher scopes such as globals.

## Example
```javascript
/**
 * @const {String}
 */
const RED = 'FF0000';
```

**[_More Info_](http://usejsdoc.org/tags-constant.html)**
